title: Butternut & kale salad with clementine vinaigrette

ingredients.item: 1 small golden butternut squash, halved, deseeded and cut into 1cm slices
150g pack Pentland Brig Kale, thick stems removed

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220ÂºC, gas mark 7. Toss the butternut squash slices in 1 tbsp walnut oil and spread over a large baking sheet. Roast for 25 minutes. Meanwhile, tear the kale into bitesized pieces and put in a colander. Rinse, then massage the kale under very warm water for 1 minute, until softened. Drain in the colander and set aside.

Whisk half the clementine zest with the juice, vinegar, mustard, dried herbs and shallot in a large bowl, then slowly whisk in the remaining 3 tbsp walnut oil until combined. Add the kale and toss until coated. Set aside.
Allow the squash to cool slightly, then scatter over the kale salad with the sliced apple, seeds and remaining clementine zest to serve.
